org.perfidix.element
Class BenchmarkExecutor

java.lang.Object
  org.perfidix.element.BenchmarkExecutor

public final class BenchmarkExecutor
extends Object

Corresponding to each method, an executor is launched to execute BeforeFirstRun, BeforeEachRun, AfterEachRun and AfterLastRun classes. To store the data if the single-execute before classes have been executed, this class is implemented as a singleton to store this information related to the method. All the data comes from the BenchmarkMethod class.

Author:
Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

Execution of bench method. All data is stored corresponding to the meters.
